publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1502 Ross Finnie: Salmon Conservation (Scotland) Bill —That the Parliament agrees that the Salmon Conservation (Scotland) Bill be passed. Supported by: Rhona Brankin*
S1M-1502 Ross Finnie: Salmon Conservation (Scotland) Bill —That the Parliament agrees that the Salmon Conservation (Scotland) Bill be passed. Supported by: Rhona Brankin
